column5: We are planning a week long trip to this area May 14-22 What is the typical weather conditions. What about flies and such any advise? We are staying in cabins but will be fishing most days.

I've been to nearby Lake Mistinikon for the week of Memorial day twice. It was about 5years ago. Weather could be in the 70's or 40's. For the hot trip (air was upper 70's and calm water surface was 70F), the black flies were biting quite well. The mosquitos were not bad. I bring a winter parka when I go that far north in June, so in May, expect snow, hope for 50's-60's. Deet is mandatory.http://www.weatheroffice.gc.ca/saiso...html#forecastshttp://www.theweathernetwork.com/fourteenday/caon0470
